content.notes: Content not refactored in Phase 1; original preserved under payload.

layout_template.notes: Layout based on the Africa_ADayInTheLife.jpg draft (layout only; character content populated from new_prompts.xlsx + North America.docx).

header.notes: Handwritten/script title at top-left over a muted world-map background.

grid.notes: Each character row = left info panel + 6 image cards. Each card has a square photo above a short caption.

characters.name: Aiyana

label.headline: Aiyana
label.subhead: A Navajo Girl in the Navajo Nation, USA
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Aiyana is a 14-year-old Navajo girl in Arizona. Navajo culture emphasizes family, respect for elders, traditions such as smudging ceremonies, and strong community ties.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Sunrise colors the rocks. I lift burning sage and feel its sweet smoke carry my words to the sky.

image.alt_text: Aiyana: Navajo Nation desert at dawn, sandstone mesas and sagebrush (United States).

image_description.from_mj_prompt: Scene 1: Navajo Nation desert at dawn, sandstone mesas and sagebrush; early teen Navajo student performing a smudging ritual with a sage bundle, a small hogan behind; medium framing; eyeâ€‘line looking to the glowing horizon with calm resolve; clear cultural anchors: sage bundle (gentle aromatic haze), woven shawl, cedar chips in a clay bowl; environmental cues: cool preâ€‘sunrise light, long mesa shadows; motion cues: thin aromatic haze curling on the breeze; Camera: Canon R6 Mark II, RF 35 mm f/1.8, ISO 200, 1/250 s; lighting: soft dawn sidelight; RAW photo, filename: IMG_8602.CR3 --ar 1:1 --style raw --stylize 50 --v 7 --sref

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I rise to speak. My hands shake then steady as I share how cactus roots store precious water.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: We spread graph paper on the picnic table. I imagine rows of corn bending in a future breeze.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Dust swirls around our boots. Grandmaâ€™s quiet song keeps the flock calm and teaches me patience.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I spin fast. My shawl flutters like a butterfly and my heart races with pure joy.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Sparks rise into black sky. I listen to old tales and feel their strength settle inside me.

characters.name: Mateo

label.headline: Mateo
label.subhead: A Coffee Farmer in the Guatemalan Highlands
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Mateo is a 40-year-old coffee farmer in the Guatemalan highlands. The local culture involves family-based agriculture (coffee being a major export), community markets, and traditional foods (like tamales).

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Cool air fills my lungs. I drop red cherries into the basket and thank the trees for their gift.

image.alt_text: Mateo: Misty highland coffee rows at first light (Guatemala).

image_description.from_mj_prompt: Scene 1: Misty highland coffee rows at first light; Guatemalan coffee farmer picking red cherries into a woven basket; mediumâ€‘wide framing; eyeâ€‘line looking toward the slope break above the next row with content focus; clear cultural anchors: woven carryâ€‘basket, shade trees, volcanic soil; environmental cues: breath mist, dew on leaves; motion cues: cherries dropping softly into the basket; Camera: Nikon Z7 II, 50 mm f/1.8, ISO 400, 1/320 s; lighting: cool dawn backlight with gentle fill; RAW photo, filename: DSC_8602.NEF --ar 1:1 --style raw --stylize 50 --v 7 --sref

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: We sit on rough roots. Mama passes beans and our laughter rises higher than the distant volcano.

image.alt_text: Mateo: Family seated on roots beneath a broad avocado tree (Guatemala).

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I rake the beans gently. Their crisp sound is like rain on a tin roof.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I pour green beans into the buyerâ€™s palm and explain how a fair price could build our new school.

scenes.caption_first_person: My fingers strum an upbeat tune. Voices blend and fireflies spark across the yard.

characters.name: Sofia

label.headline: Sofia
label.subhead: A Student in Mexico City, Mexico
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Sofia is a 17-year-old student living in urban Mexico City. Mexican culture is a rich tapestry of indigenous heritage and Spanish influence. Daily life blends modern urban living with strong family bonds and cultural traditions such as celebrating DÃ­a de losâ€¦

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I sway with the train. Music in my headphones turns crowded cars into my own moving stage.
